generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and traffic flowing on it.
- sidewalk: There is a sidewalk on the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and trees.

- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.

- bus: A red and white tram (a type of train) is visible on the road.

- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- fence: A fence is visible along the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- terrain: There is some grass and soil visible in the median and along the sidewalk.
